text: Shi Jiuyong (; 9 October 1926 – 18 January 2022) was a Chinese politician and lawyer. He was a Judge of the International Court of Justice (ICJ). Shi was elected to the ICJ on 6 February 1994, and became President nine years later on 6 February 2003. In 2010, he announced his resignation from the Court, which became official on 28 May 2010. Shi died on 18 January 2022, at the age of 95.国际法院首位中国籍院长、改革先锋史久镛逝世，享年96岁 ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:21st-century Chinese politicians Category:International Court of Justice judges Category:Chinese lawyers Category:20th-century Chinese politicians
title: Shi Jiuyong
